item.description:
June meeting of Connecticut Software Developer Startups - Monday June 17th 5:30-8PM. Bring a lot of business cards!

Please register (RSVP) here for this event.

Join the Software Startups Meetup group for more events & activities.

Presentations:

A). 'Talent Management  for Startups - how to hire and retain great employees' - Christine Santacroce (Manager Business Development - MODIS).

B). Online SaaS Recreation Mangement  - RecDesk - Mike Morris (Founder)

Want to pitch?  We'll begin the evening with a few pitches. The audience will be the judges and provide feedback. Let us know your topic and pitch duration (1-minute or 3-minutes). Send your request to ctdotnet@gmail.com
item.name: Monthly meeting Software Startups- 3rd Mondays 5:30-8PM.
